item.title: mexii
item.description: It is simple but innovative and complicated logic. Movement is in new method by pressing Enter. The indicators in the prompt line, @ [0%]: shows the direction, @ is downward and # is upward. And 0 is movement lock off, LOCKED=0 and 1 is movement lock on, LOCKED=1. % is where input letter is to appear. In this script, the chain of variables acting like toggle and relative switches is the best.
